item.title: MassHunter Profinder
item.description: I had gotten the idea for a batch feature extraction software at ASMS 2009, where I had presented a poster on a new untargeted feature extraction methodology I had developed. After showing the poster at the conference, several customers articulated to me how valuable it would be to have a batch feature extraction software workflow. I was so excited by the idea that I started writing the prototype for such an application on the airplane ride back!
